page.syntax: Text as C = GetRemainder as C()
page.description: Return from current position to end of string.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.GetRemainder() method returns the text from the current offset to the end of the buffer.
page.example: dim scanner as StringScanner dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is line one and this is line two and finally line three %text% scanner = stringscanner.Create(txt) ? scanner.ScanOver(12) = "This is line" ? scanner.GetRemainder() = one and this is line two and finally line three
